text:
<>
[[Universal|Quantity]] [[Particular|Quantity]]
[[Affirmative|Quality]] [[A|ALL Statement]]
All Dogs are Mammals 		[[I|SOME Statement]]
Some Women are Republicans
[[Negative|Quality]] [[E|NO Statement]]
No Fish are Philosophers 		[[O|SOME ARE NOT Statement]]
Some Philosophers are not Crazy
<$appear show="see version without the //''no''// quantifier" $state="slider-button">
[[Universal|Quantity]] [[Particular|Quantity]]
[[Affirmative|Quality]] [[A|ALL Statement]]
All Dogs are Mammals 		[[I|SOME Statement]]
Some Women are Republicans
[[Negative|Quality]] [[E|NO Statement]]
All Fish are not Philosophers 		[[O|SOME ARE NOT Statement]]
Some Philosophers are not Crazy
(I included it because of [[this|Quantifier]].) Highlighted in orange are the [[Distributed|Distributed Term]] terms [[|Quantifier]] [[|Subject]] [[|Copula]] [[|Predicate (Categorical Logic)]]
title: Categorical Proposition
